channel.title: CVE Feed for Movistar -- Router Movistar 4G
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Movistar -- Router Movistar 4G

item.title: CVE-2024-2415|2024-08-05T15:13:31.574Z -- movistar -- router%20movistar%204g
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in Movistar 4G router affecting version ES_WLD71-T1_v2.0.201820. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to execute commands inside the router by making a POST request to the URL '/cgi-bin/gui.cgi'.

item.title: CVE-2024-2415|2024-08-01T19:11:53.521Z -- movistar -- router%20movistar%204g
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in Movistar 4G router affecting version ES_WLD71-T1_v2.0.201820. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to execute commands inside the router by making a POST request to the URL '/cgi-bin/gui.cgi'.

item.title: CVE-2024-2416|2024-08-01T19:11:53.507Z -- movistar -- router%20movistar%204g
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability in Movistar's 4G router affecting version ES_WLD71-T1_v2.0.201820. This vulnerability allows an attacker to force an end user to execute unwanted actions in a web application in which they are currently authenticated.

item.title: CVE-2024-2414|2024-08-01T19:11:53.540Z -- movistar -- router%20movistar%204g
item.description: The primary channel is unprotected on Movistar 4G router affecting E version S_WLD71-T1_v2.0.201820. This device has the 'adb' service open on port 5555 and provides access to a shell with root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-2416|2024-03-13T11:17:42.518Z -- movistar -- router%20movistar%204g
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability in Movistar's 4G router affecting version ES_WLD71-T1_v2.0.201820. This vulnerability allows an attacker to force an end user to execute unwanted actions in a web application in which they are currently authenticated.
